Content: Seven new foreign Ambassadors and High Commissioners accredited to Sri Lanka have presented their credentials to President Maithripala Sirisena at the President’s House in Colombo. Ashraf Farhad Shikhaliyev handed over credentials as the Ambassador of Republic of Azerbaijan Daniel Chuburu is the new Ambassador of Argentine Republic David John Holly is the High Commissioner of Commonwealth of Australia Artis Bertulis – presented credentials as Ambassador of Republic of Latvia Julius Pranevicius is Ambassador of Republic of Lithuania Bounneme Chouangham is the Ambassador of Laos People’s Democratic Republic Abdulrahman Mohamed AlGaoud is the Ambassador of Kingdom of Bahrain.
